answers.answer: Yes. It could be that you have steroid-induced Cushing's. The Cushing's will suppress many hormones including thyroid and that will increase brain fog. The raise in cortisol often leads to depression, rage and in some cases bi-polar diagnosis. Lowering the pred (with the agreement and supervision of the doctor) is the cure. You may need to get a hormone check.It can also cause diabetes, bone, muscle and eye issues - and a lot more. I had Cushing's caused by a pituitary tumor.
